ValidationRule.description: Cases can only have a Resource Category of Automation when closed by the system.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( $Profile.Name <> 'System Administrator',( ISPICKVAL( Resource_Category__c , 'Automation Canceled') && ISCHANGED( Resource_Category__c) ))
&& !$Permission.Ignore_All_VR
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Automation Reason is for system only. Select a different reason.
